results.title: The Anti-Diabetic Drug Metformin Protects against Chemotherapy-Induced Peripheral Neuropathy in a Mouse Model
results.text_hl: Co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevented both @<m>DISEASE_Sensation_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012678 @@@sensory deficits@@@ and loss of IENFs in the paws.
